document.title: Graph visualization tools
document.text: TOOLS: - Design patterns Heer and Agrawala 2006 - JSNVA network drawing framework Ye et al. 2008 - VisNetMiner Shi et al. 2009
Systems described in Jünger and Mutzel 2003...

Graphviz, http://www.graphviz.org, graph-drawing program developed by Stephen North of Bell Laboratories: represents edges as splines and can construct useful drawings of quite large and complicated graphs. Gansner et al. 1988 Ellson et al. 2001 Ellson et al. 2003

list.item: "hierarchical" or layered drawings of directed graphs (dot).
Circular layout: circo Six and Tollis 1999a Six and Tollis 1999b Kaufmann and Wiese 2002

document.text: The DOT language syntax: - Grafos no dirigidos (graph --) - Grafos dirigidos (digraph ->)

Libraries: ++ JGraph, http://www.jgraph.com/, ++ JGraphT, http://jgrapht.sourceforge.net/: Java graph libraries suitable for interactive applications. ++ JGraphEd (http://www.jharris.ca/JGraphEd/): a Java graph-drawing framework that includes several planarity testing/embedding algorithms, including both the Booth-Lueker PQ-tree algorithm and the modern straight-line grid embedding
Social network analysis tools: - Pajek de Nooy et al. 2005, - NodeXL Hansen et al. 2010... include implementations of force-directed methods for visualizing social networks.
